Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Feedback from GenAI is more accessable, but needs to be considered carefully before accepting the feedback. Teacher feedback often only comes after an assessment or task is submitted, so it is often more useful to generate feedback regarding something throughout the writing/creating process.
